Who uses FRED2

Research

Academia

  • Applied Bioinformatics Group at University of Tübingen
  • Immunology Department at University of Tübingen

Software Projects

  • EpiToolKit is a webservice that provides a collection of methods from computational immunology for the development of novel epitope-based vaccines including HLA ligand or potential T-Cell epitope prediction, an epitope selection framework for vaccine design, and a method to design optimal string-of-beads vaccines.
